profile.name: WebM-VP8/Vorbis (libre)
profile.args: f=webm vcodec=libvpx crf=%quality vb=8M qcomp=1 g=15 acodec=vorbis aq=%audioquality

profile.name: MP4-H264/AAC
profile.args: f=mp4 movflags=+faststart vcodec=libx264 crf=%quality g=15 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: Matroska-H264/AAC
profile.args: f=matroska movflags=+faststart vcodec=libx264 crf=%quality g=15 acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: MPEG-2
profile.args: properties=MPEG-2 qscale=%quality aq=%audioquality
profile.speeds: subq=5 cmp=2 subcmp=2 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=3 cmp=1 subcmp=1 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=1

profile.name: WebM-VP9/Opus (libre)
profile.args: f=webm vcodec=libvpx-vp9 crf=%quality vb=15M qcomp=1 g=15 row-mt=1 tile-columns=4 frame-parallel=1 acodec=libopus compression_level=%audioquality

profile.name: WebM-AV1/Opus (libre)
profile.args: f=webm vcodec=libaom-av1 crf=%quality vb=15M qcomp=1 g=15 row-mt=1 tiles=2x2 frame-parallel=1 strict=experimental acodec=libopus ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: MP4-H265 (HEVC)
profile.args: properties=x265-medium f=mp4 vcodec=libx265 crf=%quality acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: Alpha VP8
profile.args: f=webm vcodec=libvpx auto-alt-ref=0 crf=%quality vb=10M qcomp=1 g=15 mlt_image_format=rgba pix_fmt=yuva420p acodec=vorbis aq=%audioquality

profile.name: Alpha VP9
profile.args: f=webm vcodec=libvpx-vp9 crf=%quality vb=20M qcomp=1 g=15 mlt_image_format=rgba pix_fmt=yuva420p acodec=vorbis aq=%audioquality

profile.name: Alpha MOV
profile.args: f=mov vcodec=qtrle mlt_image_format=rgba pix_fmt=argb

profile.name: FFmpeg FFV1
profile.args: f=mov vcodec=ffv1 mlt_image_format=rgba pix_fmt=argb

profile.name: VOB (DVD)
profile.args: properties=dv_%dv_standard/DVD mlt_profile=dv_%dv_standard f=dvd vcodec=mpeg2video acodec=ac3 qscale=%quality ab=%audiobitrate+'k'
profile.speeds: subq=5 cmp=2 subcmp=2 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=3 cmp=1 subcmp=1 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=1

profile.name: MPEG4-ASP/MP3 (DivX compatible)
profile.args: properties=MPEG-4-ASP qscale=%quality aq=%audioquality
profile.speeds: subq=5 cmp=2 subcmp=2 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=3 cmp=1 subcmp=1 trellis=1 bf=2;subq=1

profile.name: Windows Media Player
profile.args: f=asf vcodec=wmv2 acodec=wmav2 qscale=%quality aq=%audioquality

profile.name: NVENC AV1 VBR
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=av1_nvenc rc=constqp vqp=%quality vq=%quality acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: NVENC H264 ABR
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=h264_nvenc vb=%bitrate+'k' acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: NVENC H264 VBR
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=h264_nvenc rc=constqp vqp=%quality vq=%quality acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: NVENC H265 ABR
profile.args: f=mp4 vcodec=hevc_nvenc vb=%bitrate+'k' acodec=aac ab=%audiobitrate+'k'

profile.name: VAAPI Intel H264
profile.args: f=mp4 vaapi_device=/dev/dri/renderD128 vf=’format=nv12,hwupload’ vcodec=h264_vaapi vb=30000k acodec=aac ab=192k

profile.name: VAAPI AMD H264
profile.args: f=mp4 hwaccel=vaapi hwaccel_device=renderD129 hwaccel_output_format=vaapi vcodec=h264_vaapi vb=30000k acodec=aac ab=192k

profile.name: AC3
profile.args: ab=%audiobitrate+'k' vn=1

profile.name: ALAC
profile.args: f=mov acodec=alac vn=1 video_off=1

profile.name: FLAC
profile.args: f=matroska acodec=flac vn=1 video_off=1

profile.name: MP3
profile.args: aq=%audioquality acodec=libmp3lame vn=1

profile.name: OGG
profile.args: aq=%audioquality vn=1

profile.name: PNG with alpha
profile.args: progressive=1 f=image2 vcodec=png an=1 audio_off=1 g=1 bg=0 pix_fmt=rgba
